Get a list of games.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: A page number within the paginated result set.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search query.

parameters.name: searchPrecise
parameters.description: Disable fuzziness for the search query.

parameters.name: searchExact
parameters.description: Mark the search query as exact.

parameters.name: parentPlatforms
parameters.description: Filter by parent platforms, for example: `1,2,3`.

parameters.name: platforms
parameters.description: Filter by platforms, for example: `4,5`.

parameters.name: stores
parameters.description: Filter by stores, for example: `5,6`.

parameters.name: developers
parameters.description: Filter by developers, for example: `1612,18893` or `valve-software,feral-interactive`.

parameters.name: publishers
parameters.description: Filter by publishers, for example: `354,20987` or `electronic-arts,microsoft-studios`.

parameters.name: genres
parameters.description: Filter by genres, for example: `4,51` or `action,indie`.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Filter by tags, for example: `31,7` or `singleplayer,multiplayer`.

parameters.name: creators
parameters.description: Filter by creators, for example: `78,28` or `cris-velasco,mike-morasky`.

parameters.name: updated
parameters.description: Filter by an update date, for example: `2020-12-01,2020-12-31`.

parameters.name: platformsCount
parameters.description: Filter by platforms count, for example: `1`.

parameters.name: metacritic
parameters.description: Filter by a metacritic rating, for example: `80,100`.

parameters.name: excludeCollection
parameters.description: Exclude games from a particular collection, for example: `123`.

parameters.name: excludeAdditions
parameters.description: Exclude additions.

parameters.name: excludeParents
parameters.description: Exclude games which have additions.

parameters.name: excludeGameSeries
parameters.description: Exclude games which included in a game series.

parameters.name: excludeStores
parameters.description: Exclude stores, for example: `5,6`.

parameters.name: ordering
parameters.description: Available fields: `name`, `released`, `added`, `created`, `updated`, `rating`, `metacritic`. You can reverse the sort order adding a hyphen, for example: `-released`.

apiDescription:
The largest open video games database.

### Why build on RAWG
- More than 350,000 games for 50 platforms including mobiles.
- Rich metadata: tags, genres, developers, publishers, individual creators, official websites, release dates,
Metacritic ratings.
- Where to buy: links to digital distribution services
- Similar games based on visual similarity.
- Player activity data: Steam average playtime and RAWG player counts and ratings.
- Actively developing and constantly getting better by user contribution and our algorithms.

### Terms of Use
- Free for personal use as long as you attribute RAWG as the source of the data and/or images and add an active
hyperlink from every page where the data of RAWG is used.
- Free for commercial use for startups and hobby projects with not more than 100,000 monthly active users or 500,000
page views per month. If your project is larger than that, email us at [api@rawg.io](mailto:api@rawg.io) for
commercial terms.
- No cloning. It would not be cool if you used our API to launch a clone of RAWG. We know it is not always easy
to say what is a duplicate and what isn't. Drop us a line at [api@rawg.io](mailto:api@rawg.io) if you are in doubt,
and we will talk it through.
- You must include an API key with every request. The key can be obtained at https://rawg.io/apidocs.
If you donâ€™t provide it, we may ban your requests.

__[Read more](https://rawg.io/apidocs)__.
